WEBABOUT.VISIONDES: Olympus Business Partners seeks to be recognized within our sector of activity as a company that maintains stable and lasting relationships with our customers, as well as with our collaborators, by fulfilling their needs and expectations
WEBABOUT.OBJDESC: Provide business consulting services to small, medium and large companies, as well as organizations or individuals.
WEBFINANCIAL.PRESUDES: We convert your business idea into a plan with measurable objectives, resources and financial goals.
WEBFINANCIAL.VALORDES: In addition to assess for possible mergers, acquisitions and splits. Know how much value management generates for your stakeholders.
WEBFINANCIAL.EVALUDES: This service will help you to know how profitable is the project you have in mind and avoid the costs of a bad investment, so you can quantify it for its better development.
WEBFINANCIAL.ASESODES: We support and support your financial decision making.
WEBFINANCIAL.MONITDES: We accompany your financial committee, board of directors or management committee in the measurement, monitoring and improvement of your financial results.
WEBFINANCIAL.ANALIDES: Know your competitive position and measure yourself against adversaries and other leaders.
WEBFINANCIAL.PLANDES: It is a plan that allows you to visualize your finances and your personal (family) assets throughout your life cycle.
WEBFINANCIAL.ESTRUCDES: Indebtedness can be a lever that catapults your business or a source of inconvenience. So we support it in its correct process of obtaining resources, its structuring, restructuring or deleveraging.
WEBREAL.FONDODES: The Fund's investment process combines fundamental analysis with a value-oriented opportunistic philosophy to evaluate and allocate capital in order to provide attractive returns adjusted to risk.
WEBREAL.INVERDES: The mission is to identify, acquire and manage income generating properties that provide opportunities for investors to conserve capital investments, collect consistent cash distributions while awaiting a future revaluation of the capital of the assets.
WEBREAL.ASESODES: Historical and comparative analysis of property to facilitate decision making
WEBTI.CLOUDDES: The Cloud is a new technology that seeks to have all our files and information on the Internet, without worrying about having enough capacity to store information on our computer.
WEBTI.APLICDES: In IT, an application is a computer program designed as a tool to allow a user to perform one or several types of specific tasks.
WEBTI.SOLUCDES: We develop software products that allow your customers and partners to be more successful every day in your business. For this reason, products, tools and solutions have been developed for various types of industry and economic sector, always with the same degree of quality and excellence
WEBTI.INFRADES: We offer a set of devices and applications necessary for a company, it is known as IT infrastructure. They are included in 4 large groups: Servers, Storage, Networking and Security.
WEBTI.ADMONDES: As administrators of databases, we carry out all the activities related to the maintenance of a database environment. Among its responsibilities are those of the design, implementation, maintenance and security of the database system.
WEBTI.CAPACDES: Training is an educational process of a strategic nature applied in an organized and systemic manner, through which staff acquire or develop specific knowledge and skills related to IT tools.
WEBTI.SOPORDES: We consider technical support a range of services through which assistance is provided to users when having a problem using a product or service
WEBMARK.FOTODESC: Digital photography floods everything around us, advertising, social networks, the internet, our mobile phones, etc.
WEBMARK.DISEDESC: The advertising graphic design consists in the use of different signs to get an impressive advertising message to a specific target. For example Corporate Identity and Branding (Logo), etc.
WEBMARK.MARCADESC: For legal purposes, a trademark is a sign that is apt to distinguish a product or service in the market. When said trademark has been registered with the government entity, it is usually called 'trademark' (in English, trademark)
WEBMARK.WEBDESC: Our team of web designers has a vast experience in web design. We have customized web design packages.
WEBMARK.MKTDESC: Digital marketing is the application of marketing strategies carried out in digital media. All the techniques of the offline world are imitated and translated into a new world, the online world
